children.subject: Please email me at mejiavalencia@eecs.berkeley.edu or faculty-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu. I can add you to the system. Thanks!
Are students who will graduate this semester not able to have faculty advising? Seems like I still cannot access to the application.

history.content:
Dear Students,

After opening the Faculty Advising web application on Wednesday 10/9 at 10am as scheduled, I begun getting many emails about an error occurring in the system, so I immediately closed it and sent you all an email on Wednesday 10/9 at 10:26am through our list serves. Due to the power outage, this email was never delivered to you all as our server was down - I also posted that email in this Piazza post.
The error message has been fixed by our administrative computing group. Please access the web application now and select an available Faculty Advising session.
I hope that this email helps clarify the confusion and questions you all expressed in the multiple emails I received the last couple of days regarding this issue. Please understand that I will not be replying to those emails in order to use my time more efficiently.
The EECS Department appreciates your patience and understanding of this challenge stemming from the power outages. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns at mejiavalencia@eecs.berkeley.edu or faculty-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu 
Best,
Andrea
